snippet: LaDainian Tomlinson wasn't afraid to put his name behind criticism of Santonio Holmes, saying, "It's tough for guys to follow a captain that kind of behaves in that manner."
abstract: LaDainian Tomlinson wasn't afraid to put his name behind criticism of Santonio Holmes, saying, "It's tough for guys to follow a captain that kind of behaves in that manner."

headline.main: What Tomlinson Said About Santonio Holmes
